name: Dallas311
0:
”Alexa, ask Dallas three one one who is the mayor of Dallas?”
”Alexa, ask Dallas three one one when is my trash day?”
”Alexa, ask dallas three one one who is my council member?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dallas three one one
Developer Terms of Use
des: Dallas 311, the City of Dallas’ Amazon Alexa skill connects residents with their City. Get information related to trash collection days, the status of a service request, your Dallas City Council Member, updated coronavirus information and testing locations, as well as dates of upcoming public meetings and more!
